main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by three stockyard employees in Sioux City, Iowa, on 30 March 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15-20 minutes between 8:30 and 8:50 AM,The object appeared silver in color and was about the size of a plane at high altitude,No sound was heard, and no exhaust trail was visible,The object's altitude was estimated to be around 20,000 feet,The weather was clear with 15 miles visibility at the time of the sighting.
